text: Sandesh Samuha ('Sandesh Group') was a communist group in Nepal. It emerged as the Dang District Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Fourth Convention) separated itself from its mother party.Rawal, Bhim Bahadur. Nepalma samyabadi andolan: udbhab ra vikas. Kathmandu: Pairavi Prakashan. Chart no. 1. On December 12, 1978, the group merged into the All Nepal Communist Revolutionary Coordination Committee (Marxist-Leninist).Rawal, Bhim Bahadur. Nepalma samyabadi andolan: udbhab ra vikas. Kathmandu: Pairavi Prakashan. p. 83-84. ==References== Category:Defunct communist parties in Nepal
title: Sandesh Samuha
